data.actual_result: Button goes away. Scrolling a little bit through channel list makes it reappear
data.expected_result: Button should stay since the unread channel is still offscreen
data.short_description: The new unread button introduced in 6.8.8 disappear when rotating device until channel list is scrolled
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a server with a lot of channels, all marked as read except the one at the very bottom - Open your channel drawer. You should see the "new messages" button - Rotate device
